texts.description: The file define most of the MAM static texts. The MAM/MDM use also the localization supplied by the MetraTech plate form.

text.value:
[ES]
  You may only move accounts within the same corporate hierarchy.
[ES]Batch operations can take a long time and should only be done when the system is not busy.

[ES]
  Unable to manage the account. This may be a security restriction
  or the account may not exist at the current time in the hierarchy.
[ES]Select a Corporate Account to see a list of [TEXT_GROUP_SUBSCRIPTIONS]:
[ES]You may use the Account Hierarchy to locate a node in the hierarchy and drag it into the path field.

text.description: Select capability to add to role

text.value: [ES]Click on the rates you are interested in
[ES]There are no subscriptions for this account
[ES]This account is not a member on any group subscription
[ES]There are no disabled subscriptions for this account
[ES]Next start of payer's billing period after this date
[ES]Next end of payer's billing period after this date
[ES]Your session has timed out. Please Log In again.
[ES]Please check your user name and password and select enter to try again.
[ES]User name or password may not be blank. Please try again.
[ES]User Name is invalid, please try another one.

[ES]Unable to log on to account's interactive bill. Please check that the subscriber has the correct logon capability for MetraView. If there is still a problem have your administrator check the system log, and try again later.
[ES] You may narrow down your search by filling in multiple fields in that category.
[ES]A new charge was added successfully to the account.
[ES]Do you wish to add a payment method?
[ES]Your browser does not seem to have JavaScript enabled. Follow this link to correct the situation.
[ES]Use cycle enforced by the product offering
[ES]No subscriptions have been defined for this template.
[ES]Would you like to apply the template from [FOLDER_NAME] to the moved account(s)?
[ES]You just moved accounts to another folder, you should verify for each accounts their properties, subscriptions and security policies.
[ES]The folder has no template. Do you want to copy the parent template ?
[ES]No template exists for this folder, so a new one will be created.
[ES]Would you like to pre-populate the new template with information from the template for
[ES]Would you like to create a new template
[ES]No roles have been defined for the default security policy.

[ES]Only use this Delete Subscription button when you want to entirely remove all history that this account was ever subscribed to this product offering. Otherwise, use the Unsubscribe button on the previous Subscriptions page. See the About Deleting Subscriptions help topic for more details.
[ES]You are about to permanently delete this subscription from the system. To simply terminate it at a given date, use the unsubscribe feature.

[ES]You are about to permanently delete this group subscription and all contained data from the system. This is only allowed if there was never any participation in this group subscription. This group subscription will be removed from any account templates it may have been assigned to.
[ES]You are about to permanently remove this subscription. Click OK to proceed or Cancel to go back.
[ES]Click OK to confirm the deletion or CANCEL to go back.
[ES]Showing subscriptions that were active in the last [SUBSCRIPTION_FILTERING_INTERVAL] days
[ES]Return a list of accounts matching the search criteria.
[ES]Return a list of [TEXT_KEYTERM_SERVICE_ENDPOINTS] connected to accounts that match the search criteria.
[ES]Changing this start date may adversely affect billing cycle aligned charges contained in the associated [TEXT_KEYTERM_PRODUCT_OFFERING]!
[ES]This display is limited to 1000 results. Use filter criteria to see results not listed here.
[ES]Manage account hierarchy cannot be assigned to this role
[ES]Permits MetraNet Users Hierarchy members to manage accounts that they or their subordinates own.
